Items.Name: Unable to change project for impediment
Items.Description:
<!--markdown-->
![Mon Jan 04 2016](https://plan.tpondemand.com/Attachment.aspx?AttachmentID=383593)

Note: it's still possible to make a board where Impediments are cards and Projects are lanes and change the project via drag-and-drop

Items.Name: Wrong checkboxes in To Do list
'Allow access to timesheeet' option in role should allow to see time posted regardless project permissions
Items.Description: <!--markdown-->Right now it's not possible for managers to get reports about time posted on projects if they don't have access to these projects even if the check-box 'Allow access to Time Sheet' is switched on. This checkbox should give this access.

Items.Name: APIv2: Cast Assignable to UserStory returns null
Roles should be sorted by name (not by ID in selectors)
Items.Description: <!--markdown-->Right now roles are sorted by ID in all the selectors (a person view for example), which makes it very complicated to find the required role when you have 20+ roles. They should be sorted by name to simplify the search.

Items.Name: server error message handle fault on terms.view
Cannot paste images from outlook
Items.Description:
<!--markdown-->1. Open any email in outlook containing embedded image, right-click, Copy.
2. Paste to description or comment area


Result -> image is not displayed:


![Thu Dec 24 2015](https://plan.tpondemand.com/Attachment.aspx?AttachmentID=383152)

Items.Name: Probably, it's possible for now to fix applying of default terms in Quick Add
Items.Description:
<!--markdown-->Default Terms are not applied in Global Quick Add, Board Quick Add, List Quick Add, Inner list Quick Add:

![Wed Nov 11 2015](https://plan.tpondemand.com/Attachment.aspx?AttachmentID=379074)

![Fri Dec 18 2015](https://plan.tpondemand.com/Attachment.aspx?AttachmentID=382727)

But Default Terms are applied in Quick Add on Entity view->Actions and in Quick Add in Card context menu:

![Thu Dec 17 2015](https://plan.tpondemand.com/Attachment.aspx?AttachmentID=382603)

Items.Name: Message about an empty board is not translated
It should be possible to convert to lower case
Comet doesn't update calculated CF values on Dashboards
Items.Description:
<!--markdown-->![Wed Dec 23 2015](https://plan.tpondemand.com/Attachment.aspx?AttachmentID=383042)

Estimated budget is calculated CF. When I change request state, it appears in appropriate list but Estimated Budget value is not displayed.

Items.Name: Cannot add epic on Projects\DropDown CF view
Items.Description:
<!--markdown-->
GIVEN board view with Projects\DropDown CF on lanes
AND Epics selected as card
WHEN try to add epic from a board
THEN receive error: There's no such value for this custom field. You can't move the card here.

![Tue Dec 22 2015](https://plan.tpondemand.com/Attachment.aspx?AttachmentID=383004)

Items.Name: Change error message when assign user to entity that you have no rights to edit
Items.Description:
<!--markdown-->GIVEN logged user is non-admin having no rights to edit US
WHEN he opens US and assign any user to it
THEN  error message should appears: Update access to User Story is denied for Pete
   But   now I get message: Create access to Team is denied for Pete

Same when unassign user I get Delete access to Team is denied for Pete

Items.Name: Description should be required for URL custom field

UserStory.Name: Show Custom Fields in Quick Add Time dialog even if the fields are non-required

Items.Name: It's impossible to edit CF in some cases
Items.Description:
<!--markdown-->GIVEN CF1 of dropdown list type is created for UserStory and Bug (before 3.7.13 TP version)
WHEN I open CF1 for US and try to Edit DropDown values
THEN I get error ```The custom field name should be unique. The custom field 'CF1' is already defined for User Story. ```

Feature.Name: Custom fields for Teams and Users

Items.Name: Custom fields remapping doesn't work in some cases
Items.Description:
<!--markdown-->GIVEN Text CF with name "A" is created for User Story (mapped to CustomField1 db column)
AND Text CF with name "B" is created for Feature (mapped to CustomField1 db column)
WHEN Text CF with name "A" is created for Feature (mapped to CustomField2 db column)
THEN CustomFieldNotConfiguredException exception is thrown in CommonCustomFieldsTrigger

Expected result: CF "A" for User Story should be remapped to CustomField2 db column and all CF values for User Stories should be moved from CustomField1 to CustomField2 column in db.

Feature.Name: Custom fields for Teams and Users improvements #1

Items.Name: Description text is missing when the field is not required

UserStory.Name: Add Description field to Quick Add Time dialog even when it is not Required

Items.Name: It's impossible add time record with empty Targetprocess entity CF

UserStory.Name: Show Custom Fields in Quick Add Time dialog even if the fields are non-required

Items.Name: It shouldn't be possible edit time records of other people if 'Allow access to time sheet' option is not turned on
Flow chart: 'Related entities' string doesn't fit the appropriate section in Russian

Items.Name: Team replacement doesn't reflected in Audit History
Items.Description:
<!--markdown-->GIVEN Bug(or other assignable) is in Kanban team
WHEN I click on Kanban from Team Assignment and select Scrum team
THEN Scrum team is assigned to Bug instead of Kanban 
WHEN I have a look at Audit History
THEN   I should see that Kanban team is unassigned; Scrum team is assigned
   But   now they are absent.

Items.Name: Edit allocation popup (Team/User): the text is not shown partly in Russian
Exception on numeric entity state at flow
Items.Description:
<!--markdown-->1. Add numeric entity state. (UserStory, 12345)
2. Open flow tab on entity

Tab won't load with error in console.

Items.Name: In Russian lang in 1280 res: filters overlaps context selector, finish setup and view owners buttons are placed incorrectly
